sagma.core.math
Class Vec2

java.lang.Object
  sagma.core.math.Vec2

public class Vec2
extends java.lang.Object

An efficient vector representation of a 2D point.

Author:
Aaron Kison

Constructor Summary
Vec2(float x, float y)
          
Constructs a new 2D vector from the two given components
Vec2(Vec2 v)
          
Constructs a new 2D vector by doing a deep copy of another vector
The new vector exists independently of the other vector
Vec2(Vec3 v, boolean includeX, boolean includeY, boolean includeZ)
          
Wraps a 3D vector into a 2D vector by including selected components.

Wraps a 3D vector into a 2D vector by including selected components.
Exactly 2 components must be included

Parameters:
includeX - TRUE if x should be included
includeY - TRUE if y should be included
includeZ - TRUE if z should be included
